ikmanin enna yayi sihipath kaleya.in payakata pasuwa barti pe්ramalal disanayaka da awasanaye rathri 10 ta pamana athula wijesinha da senchuriya hotalayata paminiyaha.asanipa thaththwaya nisa dakune shan wijelal maha amathiwaraya samuluwata nopaminena bawa kalwela athuwama danwa thibini.rathri bhojanayen pasu sanskruthika sandarshanayak da sanwidhanaya kara thibu athara mahipala herathge illimak anuwa barti pe්ramalal amathyawaraya salalihini kowul handa saha punsanda hinahenne yana githa gayana kaleya.in anathuruwa sarath eekanayaka sanda adura lowa galana welawata gayamin sabhawa kulmath kaleya.wareka sarath eekanayakath barti pe්ramalal samanga yuga gi gayu athara pilleyan maha amathiwaraya mesayata thattu karamin sesu maha amathiwarun samaga gi rasa windeya.me athara giyak gayanna yayi pilleyan maha amathiwarayata ema sandarshanaya sudanam kala sabaragamuwa palath injineru sewawe pradhani pi්rayantha kumara illimak kala da pilleyan sandahan kale thama niyatha washayenma milanga maha amathi samuluwedi sinhala giyak gayimata purudu puhunuwa paminena bawaya.kese wethath sandarshanaya awasanaye pilleyan maha amathiwaraya ambailipitiyen pitawa giye pasu dina nangenahira palathe rajakari rasak athayi pawasamini.pasu dina maha amathi samuluwa aarambha wuye pilleyan ha shan wijelal maha amathiwarunge sahabhagithwayen thorawaya.sesu maha amathiwaru athulu mudal amathyanshaye lekam pi. bi. jayasundara saha rajya ha palath rajya sewawe jyeshtayanta sabaragamu maha amathi mahipala herath wisin ehidi thagi boga da pirinamana ladi.“manik ehema me thagi maluwala nadda maha amathithuma” thagi piliganna atharathura athamek mahipala herathgen perala wimasuha.
